modules_premium.name: Test1
modules_premium.description: REMOVE CHILDREN VISUALS: Removes child-like visuals from all biters, virals, and banshees in the world

modules_premium.name: Test2
modules_premium.description: WARZONES: Not meant to be lore friendly, this version of the mod is a call to arms for all Human Enemies during the day to come out and take back the city

modules_premium.name: Test3
modules_premium.description: CUSTOM MAP CHANGES: (!Work in Progress!) May cause quest bugs/frame loss, adds new custom locations to the Windmills and Bazaar Exterior.
